docs.title: Meet HomeR
docs.text: Home(plate)R(obot) is an open-source mobile robot platform. HomeR is designed for educational purposes with emphases on ROS, SLAM, Navigation, etc.. It features a differential drive system, runs on an Raspberry Pi SBC and a Raspberry Pi Pico microcontroller. All the components are easy to access or 3d printable.

docs.title: Key Specifications
docs.text: Features Details Dimensions 180 x 180 x 180 Microcontroller Raspberry Pi Pico 2 (RP2350) Computer Raspberry Pi 5 (4GB) Operating System Ubuntu 24.04 Robot Manager ROS2 Jazzy
